Contents.Content: select PatientCode, --病人编号 PatientName, --病人姓名 PatientSex, --病人性别 PatientBirthday, --出生日期 PatientIDCard, --身份证号码 SocialSecurityCard, --社保号 PatientAddress, --地址 PatientPhone, --电话 HighRiskInfectivity, --是否高危 ward_code, --病区 bed_no --床位 from Infeconhis where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 PatientCode as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 PatientBirthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --住院信息 bed_no as BEDNO --床位 from Infeconhis where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.patient_id as VALUE,--病人编号 br.name as NAME, --病人姓名 br.name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.date_of_birth as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.operation_no as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.operating_room as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.dept_stayed as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.sssj as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.operator as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.operation_desc as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from Infecon_ssxx ss inner join pat_operation br on ss.patient_id=br.patient_id inner join pat_inp zy on br.patient_id=zy.patient_id where 1=1 {0}

select br.patient_id, --病人编号 br.name, --病人姓名 br.sex, --病人性别 br.date_of_birth, --出生日期 br.age, --年龄 br.id_no, --身份证号 br.sbkh, --社保卡号 br.Next_Of_Kin_Addr, --地址 br.Next_Of_Kin_Phone, --联系电话 br.gw, gh.visit_no, --挂号系统编号 gh.jmz, --挂号类型 gh.registering_date, --挂号时间 gh.visit_dept, --挂号科室 gh.ghh --挂号号 from pat_basic br left join pat_outp gh on br.patient_id=gh.patient_id where 1=1 {0} order by gh.registering_date Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.patient_id as VALUE,--病人编号 br.name as NAME, --病人姓名 br.name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.date_of_birth as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.visit_no as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.jmz as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 gh.registering_date as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.visit_dept as REGISTERNUMBER, --挂号序号 gh.ghh as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from pat_outp gh left join pat_basic br on gh.patient_id=br.patient_id where 1=1 {0} order by gh.registering_date Desc
